thread.title: Songs you definitely shouldn’t play at a funeral (20 Photos)
thread.title_full: Songs you definitely shouldn’t play at a funeral (20 Photos)

author: Kayla
title: Songs you definitely shouldn’t play at a funeral (20 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
It’s probably no surprise that the most popular type of music played at funerals is classical and hymns. While funerals are just one of those unavoidable things in life, the experience would be less awkward and sad if you never had to hear these songs during the service. #WorstSongsToPlayAtAFuneral started trending on Twitter and these are the best/worst suggestions to keep in the back of your mind. 2
